response.overview: Chaos reigns at the natural history museum when night watchman Larry Daley accidentally stirs up an ancient curse, awakening Attila the Hun, an army of gladiators, a Tyrannosaurus rex and other exhibits.
response.title: Night at the Museum

titles.title: म्युज़ीयम के अंदर फंस गया सिकंदर
